creditline: Gift of The James Castle Collection, Boise, Idaho
description: black car with three square windows; one square and one rectangular object in LRC; green ground, blue sky; mountain in white at L; tower(?) in white at R
medium: Blue, green, and dark gray-purple washes of unknown origin and soot on thin gray found cardboard (unknown source)
provenance: The artist, Boise, Idaho; Estate of the artist, Boise, Idaho; given to MIA, 2007.
title: Untitled (Fantasy landscape with car, structures)
